metadata.title: CVE-2024-36270 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: tproxy: bail out if IP has been disabled on the device syzbotreports: general protection fault, probably for non-canonical address0xdffffc0000000003: 0000 [#1] PREEMPT SMP KASAN PTI KASAN: null-ptr-derefin range [0x0000000000000018-0x000000000000001f] [..] RIP:0010:nf_tproxy_laddr4+0xb7/0x340 net/ipv4/netfilter/nf_tproxy_ipv4.c:62Call Trace: nft_tproxy_eval_v4 net/netfilter/nft_tproxy.c:56 [inline]nft_tproxy_eval+0xa9a/0x1a00 net/netfilter/nft_tproxy.c:168__in_dev_get_rcu() can return NULL, so check for this.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-36270` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-121-generic - 5.15.0-121.131
linux-image-5.15.0-121-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-121.131
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-121-generic - 5.15.0-121.131
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-121-generic-64k - 5.15.0-121.131
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1066-kvm - 5.15.0-1066.71
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1069-aws - 5.15.0-1069.75
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1072-azure - 5.15.0-1072.81
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1072-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1072.81.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1068-gcp - 5.15.0-1068.76
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1066-gke - 5.15.0-1066.72
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1052-gkeop - 5.15.0-1052.59
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1062-ibm - 5.15.0-1062.65
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1064-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1064.70
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1064-nvidia - 5.15.0-1064.65
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1064-nvidia-lowlatency - 5.15.0-1064.65
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1067-oracle - 5.15.0-1067.73
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-1062-raspi - 5.15.0-1062.65
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1070-realtime - 5.15.0-1070.78
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-121.131').
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').
